longBusinessSummary: Kuala Lumpur Kepong Berhad engages in the plantation, manufacturing, and property development businesses. The company operates through Plantation, Manufacturing, Property Development, Investment Holding, and Others segments. It is involved in the cultivation, processing, and marketing of palm and rubber products; extraction of crude palm oil; refining of palm products; and kernel crushing and trading of palm products. The company also manufactures and trades in oleochemicals, fatty acids and glycerin, industrial amides, fatty alcohol and methyl esters, non-ionic surfactants, soap noodles, triacetin, special paper chemicals and surfactants, and palm phytonutrients and other palm derivatives; detergents, auxiliary materials for detergents and cosmetics, and basic organic chemicals from agricultural products; and ether sulphates, alcohol sulphates, and sulphonic acids. In addition, it provides rubber gloves, parquet flooring products, and pharmaceutical and bio-pharmaceutical intermediates and fine chemicals, as well as stores and distributes bulk liquid. Further, the company develops residential and commercial properties. Additionally, it engages in farming, management, and money lending activities, as well as operates biogas power plants. The company also operates holiday bungalows and manages properties; manufactures jams and preserves; and offers offshore captive insurance and logistics services related to palm products. It serves home and personal care, pharmaceuticals, food and nutrition, flavors and fragrances, lubricants, and industrial chemicals markets. The company operates in Malaysia, Far East, Middle East, South East Asia, Southern Asia, Europe, North America, South America, Australia, Africa, and internationally. Kuala Lumpur Kepong Berhad was founded in 1906 and is based in Ipoh, Malaysia.
